meanings.sent1: The anthoid pattern on the fabric looked like a beautiful flower garden.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted an anthoid design on the canvas, capturing the essence of a blooming flower.
meanings.sent3: The anthoid decorations at the party made it feel like a magical garden.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was anthoid, spreading joy like petals in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The anthoid scent of the perfume filled the room with the fragrance of fresh flowers.

meanings.definition: Having the characteristics of a flower.
meanings.sent1: The anthoid dress she wore had delicate petals sewn onto the skirt.
meanings.sent2: The anthoid colors of the sunset painted the sky in shades of pink and orange.
meanings.sent3: His anthoid personality bloomed in the company of his friends.
meanings.sent4: The music flowed through her like an anthoid melody, soothing her soul.
meanings.sent5: The anthoid beauty of the garden enchanted all who visited.

meanings.sent1: The anthoid decorations at the wedding were a tribute to the bride's love for flowers.
meanings.sent2: The anthoid fragrance of the candle brought memories of a spring garden.
meanings.sent3: The anthoid wallpaper in the room made it feel like a secret garden.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as soft and anthoid as a petal brushing against the skin.
meanings.sent5: The anthoid patterns on the china plates added a touch of elegance to the table setting.
